mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.obj_table AS "objTable", a.obj_id AS "objId", a.alarm_type AS "alarmType", a.param AS "param", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a18.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ccm_alarm_log a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.obj_table = 'ccm_mobile_device' AND a.alarm_type = #{alarmType} AND a.create_by = #{createBy.id} AND a.obj_id = #{objId} AND (a.create_date > date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate() , INTERVAL 0 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND a.create_date < date_format( DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_alarm_log( id, obj_table, obj_id, alarm_type, param, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{objTable}, #{objId}, #{alarmType}, #{param}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
